detaileddescription.para: This project is a basic Autotools: ./autoreconf -vfi
This will create you: a java/vw4tools.jar that is the compiled code form this project

para.heading: a convjars/vw4tools.jar file that is all the compiled code plus dependencies

detaileddescription.para: This convjars/vw4tools.jar is used on self-testing or regression-testing
